message.content:
I need to identify the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay or recover during the reporting period based on the financial statement.

Looking through the provided financial statements:

1. In the balance sheet, I see "Taxes Payable" with an End_amount of 38779.91
2. In the cash flow statement, I see "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with an Amount of 38779.91
3. Most importantly, in the income statement, I see "Tax Expense" with an Amount of 38779.91

The "Tax Expense" line in the income statement represents the total amount of tax the entity is expected to pay during the reporting period. This is the specific item I need to extract according to the task description.

Therefore, the tax amount the entity is expected to pay is 38779.91.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '38779.91'} }
```
